required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of HSK3486 in Healthy Elderly Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Study Evaluating Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamics and Safety of Intravenous Administration of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion in Healthy Elderly Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: It is a single-center, open-label, dose-finding, Phase I clinical study evaluating the pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics, and safety characteristics of HSK3486 in healthy elderly subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
primary_outcome.description: Cmax（a measure of the body's exposure to HSK3486）will be compared between non-elderly subjects and elderly subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
primary_outcome.description: AUC（a measure of the body's exposure to HSK3486）will be compared between non-elderly subjects and elderly subjects.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -5 minutes before administration until 1 hours post administration on day 1
-5 minutes before administration until 1 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: blood pressure（systolic, diastolic and mean arterial pressure）
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the screening to 2 days post-dose

arm_group.description: Elderly groupⅠ 65 years or older 0.2 mg/kg HSK3486
Elderly group Ⅱ 65 years or older 0.3 mg/kg HSK3486
Elderly group Ⅲ 65 years or older 0.4 mg/kg HSK3486
Non-elderly group IV 18 to 64 years 0.4 mg/kg HSK3486

intervention.description: Intravenously infuse 0.2 mg/kg HSK3486 in the morning on an empty stomach. Complete infusion within 1 min.
Intravenously infuse 0.3 mg/kg HSK3486 in the morning on an empty stomach. Complete infusion within 1 min.
Intravenously infuse 0.4 mg/kg HSK3486 in the morning on an empty stomach. Complete infusion within 1 min.
Intravenously infuse 0.4 mg/kg HSK3486 in the morning on an empty stomach. Complete infusion within 1 min.

overall_official.affiliation: Phase I Clinical Trial Laboratory，The First Hospital of Jilin University

results_reference.citation: Qin L, Ren L, Wan S, Liu G, Luo X, Liu Z, Li F, Yu Y, Liu J, Wei Y. Design, Synthesis, and Evaluation of Novel 2,6-Disubstituted Phenol Derivatives as General Anesthetics. J Med Chem. 2017 May 11;60(9):3606-3617. doi: 10.1021/acs.jmedchem.7b00254. Epub 2017 Apr 28.
